message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $140. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $135. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product at this price. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more like $125. I really like the product, but I'm trying to stick to a budget. Can you see if you can do any better?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $129. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal. What do you think?
I really appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you at $128. Can you see if you can meet me at this price?
